## resolveAsCSS variable

Takes a color in one of the following formats and tries to convert it to a CSS string:

- any IColor instance - raw RGBA vector - number ((A)RGB int) - string (unchanged)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveAsCSS: (col: any) => any
```
